channel.title: 9 Appendices on HW/SW codesign

item.title: 901 - Roger
item.author: fname.lnameA Tkuleuven.be (Jo Vliegen)
item.description: Within the Engineering Technology program it is sometimes needed to have access to a server. For the purpose, Roger was born. This server is accessible over the Internet through SSH. You have received (or will receive) an email that contains your username and password. SSH-ing To connect to Roger, an SSH client should be used (e.g. putty). In case a GUI will be used, an Xserver should be run on your machine.
